meanings.definition: Misstyles: to style incorrectly or inappropriately
meanings.sent1: She misstyles her hair every morning, making it look messy.
meanings.sent2: He always misstyles his outfits, wearing mismatched clothes.
meanings.sent3: The fashion disaster misstyles her wardrobe, creating unique combinations.
meanings.sent4: The artist misstyles the canvas, turning it into a chaotic masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: Misstyling her appearance, she stood out in a sea of well-dressed individuals.

meanings.sent1: Her misstyles in fashion often led to embarrassing moments.
meanings.sent2: The misstyles of the room clashed with the elegant decor.
meanings.sent3: The misstyles of the party decorations made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The misstyles of the painting gave it a quirky charm.
meanings.sent5: The misstyles of the building's architecture stood out in the neighborhood.
